column2: "Something that happened forty years ago? You must be talking about the Elder War."
"I heard that that was when you sealed [Elder] away, but I've been wondering how you did it, exactly."
"Hmmm. I could explain it to you, but it might not make a lot of sense. Is that alright?"
"Of course! I'll do my best to follow along!"
"Well first, we prepared for the fight on Naberius by squeezing the Photons together. You can make a barrier by doing that."
"...Mm? A barrier?"
"Then, with everyone's help, we led [Elder] inside the barrier during the fight."
"Once he was inside we squished all the Photons and clanked him into place. Then we put a complex lock on it from the outside."
"Squished and...clanked?"
"Though you know, now that I think about it, maybe it wasn't such a good idea to use Clarissa as the key."
"...Ahh, but if we'd used my body instead, Luther probably could have picked the lock. Guess neither would've worked."
"Oh well, that's ancient history. Nothing we can do about it now."
"Whoopsie, I got off track. So, did you get all that?"
"...Sorry, I didn't really understand."
"Ahaha, that figures. Not even Cas could make sense of my own personal analyses."
"But that wasn't actually what you wanted to hear from me, was it?"
"It's okay, you can ask me whatever you want. If I don't want to answer, I won't."
"...I was wondering what kind of promise it was you made with Regius forty years ago."
"A promise with Regius from back then...? Hm...? Ahh...!"
"...Err, now what was it again?"
"Did she think we'd buy that?!"
"You can't say?"
"Did you forget?"
"It's not that I can't, but I don't want to..."
"Of course not, I remember it like it was just yesterday."
"But remembering it and revealing it are two different matters."
"Won't promises go unfulfilled if you tell others about them?"
"So, I won't."
"Besides, Gi and Ri are still hard at work keeping that promise we made."
"It's kind of a vague, ambiguous promise, not really about anything specific... But I won't say what it was."
"Sorry, you two. But a girl's gotta have a few secrets to add that bit of mystery, you know?"
